PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2017-13392017-11-02,  ,  ECCC,  , 
ActCanadian Environmental Assessment Act, 2012
SubjectFrontier Oil Sands Mine Project
PrecisOrder extending by an additional 240 days the time limit to allow the Joint Review Panel that is conducting the environmental assessment of the FRONTIER OIL SANDS MINE PROJECT additional time to submit its report.
AttachmentsAttachment
